reviews.review: Love Dead by Daylight. It's basically a game of hide and seek/tag. But with that said, it has a few problems. Poor server connections and/or crashing is one. It feels like everytime I go to play it, the killer ques are bugged, I can't connect to the server, or I get into a game as survivor just to have the game either crash, disconnect from the host, or end up having so many survivors quit/killer quit that it becomes a not enjoyable experience... Almost played this game for three hundered hours, and about 95% was before the 2018 Halloween update... the one that made killer ques 60+ minutes long... Personally I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone, if you have it and want to get back into it... good luck getting it work right... Sometimes I wonder if the all the problems are due to it being an older game without any real competition for the hideseek/tag elments.  Lately Behavior seems seems more interested in Cosmetic DLC, and killers/survivors then looking for remedies to solve all the connection issues. Players shouldn't be able to exploit bugs and stand walk to places where killers can't hit them lol it ends up breaking the the games experience.

[h1]One of the only mutiplayer games I really enjoy.[/h1] 
Sure, it has it's flaws, but devs always try to fix them even if it takes them some time. There are always updates. They implement regularly new characters and maps (Every 3 months). They have ingame events where you can earn cosmetics for your characters. You can get almost every character for free (except licenced characters) and there are a lot them. You just have to play matches to earn ingame currency to buy them. It has a lot of replay value and never gets boring (I play it on PC and PS4).
Dead by Daylight is defintely one of my favourite games.
[u]It's not pay to win.[/u]

(Background) 
7/10
Four survivors spawn in with one killer. There are a total of 8 gens in the map and 5 gens have to be completed by the survivors to power the exit gates. The killer has to kill all 4 survivors to win. Survivors have things like toolboxs/flashlights/and medkits to help. There are a total of four perks allowed for each survivor and killer. 

This game was a great game and still has potential but for the past while the devs have been shitting on survivors. After the 2.0 update the game has gotten a lot harder for survivors and easier for killers. Things like pallets, flashlights, healing, vaulting (tools to help survivors) and more have all been nerfed tremendously. A personal problem with my playstyle is people in the game don't like taking chances. They play the game very cautiously and slow. On rare occasion I will get the fun ones that play it interestingly. If you play this game learn what it means to 'loop' and '360' dont be a pu$$y gen jockey the whole time.

There's a lot bugs but dev's just listen to your players! Fix the things we tell you are broken.
I would recommend leaving the lobby after the match, the community is pretty toxic and you'll get pretty toxic comments.

Das Spiel macht Anfangst SpaÃŸ, jedoch nach einiger Zeit macht es einfach keine Lust mehr. Das Spiel Prinzip ist nicht schlecht jedoch einfach langweilig umgesetzt man versucht das Spiel mit DLC's am Leben zu halten, allerdings macht es das Spielerlebnis auch nicht besser. Es gibt einfach zu wenige Dinge die das Spiel abwechslungsreich machen. Versteht mich nicht Falsch aber nach einer Runde habe ich persÃ¶nlich einfach keinen Bock mehr. AuÃŸerdem gibt es noch Killer die einfach viel zu OP sind und als wÃ¤re es nicht genug noch mit Perks verbessert werden kÃ¶nnen so, dass man keine Chance mehr hat. Das Perk-System finde ich eigentlich gut, aber es gibt einfach zu krasse Perks die den Spiel-SpaÃŸ einfach rauben. Dennoch hat das  Spiel auch seine guten Seiten, aber es gibt einfach zu viele Dinge die das Spiel einfach nur nervig machen.

This game has potential but it is so bad. Every third game me or a teammate disconnects and we are at a disadvantage. Then youve got insane campers who spend their whole life at your hook... even Killer who can teleport to positions like hooks exist. I just dont get it. Sometimes you are playing with trolls, sometimes you play with teammates who dont seem to understand the game and try to win solo or just want to gain bloodpoints... The ranking system is useless because at a certain level you can derank and you have to play with people, who aint that good and you sometimes stuck at a certain level. And no rewards for ranks... not even those stupid bloodshards... I think that the DbD publishers just want our money by selling cosmetics under such prizes... in a game were you purchased for 10-20 $ or â‚¬. I promise yxou, dont buy this game and buy other survival games or stuff. This aint worth your time

The game is not perfect, but, if you're prepared to put up with some things, I recommend it. I speak as someone with 1500+hrs who plays both roles.

If you're new, you'll lose a lot. You'll make mistakes, and be mocked/punished for them. You'll work your way slowly toward having meta perks and a baseline of experience by which to enjoy the game more fully. The game has some bugs, but it's come a long way from what it used to be.

Survivors can lengthen chases by looping, a leftover from the old infinites and jungle gyms. As most players play mainly survivor, this is not frowned upon. I feel it is an unfun mechanic that takes away from the nature of the game. It is extremely effective and killers are ranked based on their ability to counter this mechanic.

Killers can secure easier victories by tunneling (generally coupled with a camp, soft camp, patrol, etc.). By prioritising the recently-unhooked and already injured survivor, the killer can remove players from the game with more ease, and increase the chance of killing at least 3 survivors and securing a pip or two. I feel it is an unfun mechanic that takes away from the nature of the game. As most players play mainly survivor, this is generally frowned upon.

There are counters of some extent to both of these advantages, but that's the gist of this game at the upper ranks. As I consider these tactics unfun, I will not participate in them myself, unless goaded into it. I assure you that there are other ways of playing the game, albeit potentially less effective.

//As of recent patch, "pipping", means by which you increase in rank, has become significantly more difficult as you move higher in the ranks. While perhaps a little overkill, it's a wonderful solution to the prior ease by which survivors would reach high ranks. I have high expectations that it can help shape the game's meta by rewarding and punishing certain behaviors.

//Additional note regarding queue times: queues will float between extremes where "perfect teams" are compiled with a long wait time, and "unbalanced teams" are comprised in a shorter wait time. There is no perfect answer for everyone. Sometimes you'll get into a lobby very quickly that has subpar balance, and other time's you'll queue for half an hour before reaching your first lobby. I expect the new ranking system will change things up as time goes on and adjustments are made.

I love this game, itâ€™s addicting, fast paced, and asymmetrical. With one killer and four survivors you have to work together to power the generators to power the exit gates fo leave. Can go in with friends and survive together or even play as the killer and have fun practicing with all of the perks available.

A few things that could make this game more enjoyable:
-Penalties for rage quitting. Lots of pugs will just leave the match and leave you hanging
-More emotes (possibly like a â€œNoâ€ or â€œstop what you are doingâ€ sort of emote
-The matchmaking system is something they are already working on so that was another. Very random killers ranging from a level 20 to a level 2 while Iâ€™m playing on my level 5 character. 

A few things this game is doing right:
- The perks are definitely becoming more interesting over time
-New DLC every 3 months. (6.99$ USD) but includes new survivor and killer. 
- the events are great. Have had tons of fun with the winter event, ugly Christmas sweater and lunar new year eventd

This review is not being made for hating on the game, i only want to improve the game since i love it. Also, my killer result is really weird and i think is broken because when i kill nobody it says i am a brutal killer and when i kill all it does not say merciless killer(from what i have seen that is what should happen). if this is just a thing that is wrong with my DBD or settings, please let me know in comments thx :3.  This really annoyed me when i got the game since it was not what i expected and what i have seen. Overall, this is one of the best games I have played and recommend it highly for people looking for stealth related games. Thx for reading! hope this helped ;D
